results.name: Number of quadratic nonresidues modulo n.
comment: A218578(n) is the number of times n occurs in this sequence. - _Dmitri Kamenetsky_, Nov 03 2012
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Quadratic Nonresidue
maple: for q from 0 to n-1 do
mathematica: Table[Length[Complement[Range[n-1], Union[Mod[Range[n]^2, n]]]], {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Nov 06 2012 *)
